nodes.text: Arel Trem was a corrupt Customs Officer of the New Mandalorian government. During the Clone Wars, Arel Trem was part of Mandalore Customs and was to accept fifty crates of Corellian Run MultiMeals in exchange for giving 200 credits per case.
Arel Trem was mentioned in Collapse of the Republic, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
